trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Junction City
There were no other sightings in Junction City on or around September 22nd 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsI just went outside to have a cigarette, I always look up at the night sky to look at the stars. I saw something not making any noise moving in a V pattern towards the south. I have thought I have seen things before and was able to explane them away as something else. well as I was watching this i was trying to do the samething, The only thing i could think of is birds flying south until it turned. I not a bird expert but i dont think that birds can turn on a dime like this thing did. Also i dont believe that birds fly at night but i can be wrong about the birds i just dont know. the crazyess thing i think about it was that it was almost bleanded into the sky. the only thing that i could see was a small trace of white in the V pattern. Its kind of shocking, Being former Military I know if it was a militray bird or not and i know what they sound like and look like when they fly at night. this was not it at all. Really i am just shocked right now.
Summary: I really dont know what I saw and I know you guys get to the bottom of things like this.
